text:
@realDonaldTrump You're done. 

Why not spend the time you tweeted these to really unify the country on #COVID19? 

What is wrong with you, Mr. Obese golfer?

You can't be this stupid.

I dunno, listening to Pence marvel at your holiness, maybe you guys ARE this stupid.
